articles.title: Pucovski cleared of concussion and in selection mix for third Test - The Age
articles.description: After several false starts, Will Pucovski moved closer to a long-awaited Test debut on Tuesday while David Warner also trained in Sydney ahead of his return.
articles.content: But having been told - according to Langer - that the head knocks are "not necessarily going to have any long-term impact on him", Pucovski is determined to finally make his arrival on the internatio… [+3493 chars]
